file.name: openapi.yaml

  x-logo:
    url: https://geodesystems.com/repository/images/geodesystems.png
  x-origin:

        url: https://github.com/lucybot/api-spec-converter
        version: 2.7.31
      format: swagger
      url: https://geodesystems.com/repository/swagger/api-docs
      version: "1.2"
  x-providerName: geodesystems.com

paths:
  /repository/entry/show:
    get:
      description: "API to call: Extract sheets"
      operationId: media_tabular_extractsheet
      parameters:
        - description: Output type  -don't change
          in: query
          name: output
          required: true
          schema:
            default: media_tabular_extractsheet
            type: string
        - description: Entry ID
          in: query
          name: entryid
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: Sheets
          in: query
          name: arg1
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: No response was specified
      summary: API for Extract sheets
      tags:
        - service/media_tabular_extractsheet
  /repository/search/type/2017_boulder_election_expenditures:
    get:
      description: API to search for entries of type 2017 Boulder Election Expenditures
      operationId: search_2017_boulder_election_expenditures
      parameters:
        - description: Search text
          in: query
          name: text
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: Search name
          in: query
          name: name
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: Search description
          in: query
          name: description
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: From date
          in: query
          name: fromdate
          required: false
          schema:
            format: date-time
            type: string
        - description: To date
          in: query
          name: todate
          required: false
          schema:
            format: date-time
            type: string
        - description: Archive create date from
          in: query
          name: createdate.from
          required: false
          schema:
            format: date-time
            type: string
        - description: Archive create date to
          in: query
          name: createdate.to
          required: false
          schema:
            format: date-time
            type: string
        - description: Archive change date from
          in: query
          name: changedate.from
          required: false
          schema:
            format: date-time
            type: string
        - description: Archive change date to
          in: query
          name: changedate.to
          required: false
          schema:
            format: date-time
            type: string
        - description: Parent entry
          in: query
          name: group
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: File suffix
          in: query
          name: filesuffix
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: Northern bounds of search
          in: query
          name: maxlatitude
          required: false
          schema:
            format: float
            type: number
        - description: Western bounds of search
          in: query
          name: minlongitude
          required: false
          schema:
            format: float
            type: number
        - description: Southern bounds of search
          in: query
          name: minlatitude
          required: false
